name: Pump-kin
description:
A game made for a MiniJam 89: Pumpkin - https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-89-pumpkin

Enjoy!

Credits:

Art: by Me with a bit of help from @aagnusdei_ (Instagram)

Code: by Me (with exception for one script from https://www.reddit.com/r/Unity2D/comments/3h7qt3/offscreen_enemy_indicator_script_in_comments/)

Music: generated on https://pernyblom.github.io/abundant-music/index.html

Sound effects: https://www.zapsplat.com/
